participant_1.background:
I like to watch my dolphins swimming in the ocean.
I was a musician before my current job.
i enjoy horseback riding.
i am a full time mom.
i enjoy putting alcohol in my coffee.

participant_2.background:
I have never been arrested, but I have been warned by the police for riding my horse too fast.
i enjoy writing for long periods of time.
i am an excellent student.
I am not a morning person, but my pets always wake me up with a smile.
I remember reading books in the car with my dad when we were going on long road trips.

content.text: Hello! How are you today?
Hello there! I'm doing well, thanks! How are you doing?
I'm great! Thanks for asking. Do you have any hobbies?
I enjoy writing for long periods of time. I find it very relaxing. Do you have any hobbies?
I like to watch dolphins swimming in the ocean. I also enjoy horseback riding.
That's interesting! I've never been horseback riding before. What's it like?
It's a lot of fun! I love the feeling of the wind in my hair and the sun on my face.
That sounds amazing! I'd love to try it sometime.
You should! It's a great way to relax and enjoy nature.
Thanks for the suggestion! I'll definitely look into it.
No problem! So, what do you do for a living?
I'm a student, and I'm also a writer.
Oh, that's great! What are you studying?
I'm studying English literature.
That's awesome! I love English literature.
Me too! It's so interesting to learn about all the different works of literature and their authors.
It is! I love reading about the different cultures and time periods that the books were written in.
Me too! It's so fascinating to see how different cultures view the world.
It is! I love learning about new things.
Me too! I think it's so important to keep learning and growing.
I agree! It's the best way to stay sharp and engaged in the world.
I think so too! So, what are you doing for the rest of the day?
I'm not sure yet. I might go for a walk or read a book.
That sounds like a great way to spend the day. I'm going to go do some writing.
Have fun!
Thanks! You too
